body_html:
we should take the same approach as we took for CUDA multiprocessing Tensors. We need to allow dangling and document it.
I think there's enough clarity in that approach and converting to/from DLPack is niche enough that this is completely okay.

body:
we should take the same approach as we took for CUDA multiprocessing Tensors. We need to allow dangling and document it.
I think there's enough clarity in that approach and converting to/from DLPack is niche enough that this is completely okay.
